tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audit_trails (
  trail_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  action TEXT,
  date TIMESTAMP,
  data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE audit_trails (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  details VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  description VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE audit_trail (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  user_id INT,
  details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  entity_id INT,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
  compliance_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE audit_trails (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  event_date TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  compliant BOOLEAN,
  compliance_date DATE,
  compliance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE decentralized_financial_apps (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  app_name VARCHAR(50),
  platform VARCHAR(50),
  deployment_date DATE,
  developer VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_transactions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  from_account INT,
  to_account INT
);

CREATE TABLE financial_transactions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  transaction_type VARCHAR,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
